name: zygarde-cube
effect: Contains collected Zygarde cells/cores.  Can teach Zygarde moves.
short_effect: Contains collected Zygarde cells/cores.  Can teach Zygarde moves.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells.
You can also use it to teach Zygarde moves.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells.
You can also use it to teach Zygarde moves.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells.
You can also use it to teach Zygarde moves.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
An item in which Zygarde Cores and Cells are gathered.
You can also use it to change Zygarde’s forms.
